GSD.description:
dm raid: fix KASAN warning in raid5_add_disks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.251 by commit 3553a69bb52be2deba61d0ca064c41aee842bb35. For more details please see the references link.
